An expression that specifies the string in which the search is to take place.
An expression that specifies the string in which the search is to take place.

description: The REGEXP_COUNT scalar function returns a count of the number of times that a regular expression pattern is matched in a string.
sample:
SELECT REGEXP_COUNT(
   'Steven Jones and Stephen Smith are the best players', 'Ste(v|ph)en') 
      FROM sysibm.sysdummy1
